displayName.french: Vous avez terminé Le Manoir Fortesque

description.english: Destroy the Chaos Engine
description.german: Zerstöre die Chaos Engine.
description.french: Détruisez la Machine du chaos
description.spanish: Destruye Chaos Engine
description.russian: Уничтожьте Машину Хаоса

description.english: Destroy the Chaos Engine with 2 players alive
description.german: Zerstöre mit 2 Spielern die Chaos Engine und überlebt es beide.
description.french: Détruisez la Machine du chaos avec 2 joueurs en vie
description.spanish: Destruye Chaos Engine con 2 jugadores vivos
description.russian: Уничтожьте Машину Хаоса двумя живыми игроками
description.polish: Zniszcz maszynę z 2 graczami pozostałymi przy życiu
description.brazilian: Destrua a Chaos Engine com 2 personagens vivos.

description.english: Collect 10000 money in a single play through

description.spanish: Recoge 1.0000 de dinero en una partida

description.polish: Zbierz 10000 w gotówce w pojedynczej grze
description.brazilian: Colete 10.000 em dinheiro sem parar de jogar.

description.english: Kill 20 enemies in a single run without losing any health

description.english: Fully upgrade a single statistic for any character

description.polish: Rozwiń maksymalnie jedną statystykę dowolnej postaci
description.brazilian: Faça o upgrade completo de uma única estatística de qualquer personagem.

description.english: Find 28 gold keys in a single run
description.german: Finde 28 Goldschlüssel in einem einzigen Lauf.
description.french: Trouvez 28 Clés d'or en une partie

description.brazilian: Encontre 28 chaves de ouro sem parar de jogar.

description.english: Complete the campaign in a single run

description.french: Terminez la campagne en une fois
description.spanish: Completa la campaña de una pasada
description.russian: Пройдите кампанию за одну сессию

description.english: Die 100 times
description.german: Sterbe 100 Mal.
description.french: Mourez 100 fois
description.spanish: Muere 100 veces
description.russian: Умрите 100 раз
description.brazilian: Morra 100 vezes.

description.english: Resurrect 10x dead characters in co-op games
description.german: Belebe tote Charaktere in Co-op-Spielen 10 Mal wieder.
description.french: Ressuscitez 10x des personnages morts dans une partie en coopération
description.spanish: Resucita a 10x personajes muertos en partidas cooperativas
description.russian: Воскресите убитых персонажей в совместной игре 10 раз
description.polish: Wskrześ 10 razy zabite postacie w grach w trybie współpracy
description.brazilian: Reviva personagens mortos 10x em partidas cooperativas.

description.english: 24 hours played in total
description.german: Insgesamt 24 Stunden gespielt.
description.french: 24 heures jouées au total
description.spanish: 24 horas jugadas en total
description.russian: Проведите в игре в сумме 24 часа
description.brazilian: Jogou um total de 24 horas.

description.english: Complete single-player campaign playing as all six characters
description.german: Absolviere eine Einzelspielerkampagne mit allen sechs Charakteren.
description.french: Terminez la campagne à un joueur en incarnant les six personnages

description.polish: Ukończ kampanię dla jednego gracza, grając wszystkimi sześcioma postaciami
description.brazilian: Termine a campanha de um jogador jogando com todos os seis personagens.

description.english: Reach Game Over with less than 1000 score
description.german: Verliere das Spiel mit weniger als 1000 Punkten.
description.french: Perdez la partie avec moins de 1 000 points

description.polish: Ukończ grę z wynikiem mniejszym niż 1000 punktów
description.brazilian: Chegue ao Fim do Jogo com menos de 1.000 pontos.
